name: claude-code-system-prompts (Piebald-AI)
description: [项目级] All parts of Claude Code's system prompt, 18 builtin tool descriptions, sub agent prompts (Plan/Explore/Task), utility prompts (CLAUDE.md, compact,  statusline, magic docs, WebFetch, Bash cmd, security review, agent creation).  Updated for each Claude Code version.。来源: https://github.com/Piebald-AI/claude-code-system-prompts

genes.title: 项目概述
genes.content:
All parts of Claude Code's system prompt, 18 builtin tool descriptions, sub agent prompts (Plan/Explore/Task), utility prompts (CLAUDE.md, compact,  statusline, magic docs, WebFetch, Bash cmd, security review, agent creation).  Updated for each Claude Code version.

来源: https://github.com/Piebald-AI/claude-code-system-prompts
语言: JavaScript
Stars: 4697
